languages.text: "Это очень резкое заявление. Возможно, вы хотели бы немного тщательнее его обдумать?"
"Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"
languages.original_text: "Это очень резкое заявление. Возможно, вы хотели бы немного тщательнее его обдумать?"

traits.locale_text: "That is a very drastic declaration. Perhaps you would like to think it over a little more carefully?"
"That is a very drastic declaration. Perhaps you would like to think it over a little more carefully?"
"Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"
"Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"
"Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

languages.text: 「厳しいお言葉ですね。こちらの提案をもう少し検討されてはいかがでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

traits.locale_text: 「厳しいお言葉ですね。こちらの提案をもう少し検討されてはいかがでしょうか？」

languages.text: “您的话很有力量，不过或许您愿意再多考虑一下我的提议？”
languages.original_text: "Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

traits.locale_text: “您的话很有力量，不过或许您愿意再多考虑一下我的提议？”

languages.text: «Palabras tajantes, cuando menos. ¿No le gustaría darle una vuelta a mi propuesta?».
languages.original_text: "Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

traits.locale_text: «Palabras tajantes, cuando menos. ¿No le gustaría darle una vuelta a mi propuesta?».

languages.text: « Quelle inflexibilité. Je vous invite néanmoins à réfléchir à ma proposition. »
languages.original_text: "Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle inflexibilité. Je vous invite néanmoins à réfléchir à ma proposition. »

languages.text: "Starke Worte. Vielleicht wollt Ihr über meinen Vorschlag doch noch ein wenig nachdenken?"
languages.original_text: "Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

traits.locale_text: "Starke Worte. Vielleicht wollt Ihr über meinen Vorschlag doch noch ein wenig nachdenken?"

languages.text: "Keskin sirke küpüne zarar derler. Hemen kestirip atmasanız da teklifimi biraz daha düşünseniz?"
languages.original_text: "Strong words. Perhaps you would like to give my proposal a little more consideration?"

traits.locale_text: "Keskin fikir, Hür Tacirine zarar. Teklifimi değerlendirmek istemediğinize emin misiniz?"
